posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Magie PSA or SGC AUTH or 1
posts.post_content:

Looking for a graded copy,  authentic or 1 

If you have it for sale or you see it for sale contact me by PM.
Thanks everybody.

GO BIG OR GO HOME!

Best of luck on your quest!!
